Class DashUtil

  • java.lang.Object

  • public final class DashUtil
extends Object
    Utility methods for DASH streams.

      • loadManifest

        public static DashManifest loadManifest(DataSource dataSource,
                                        String manifestUri)
                                 throws IOException
        Loads a DASH manifest.
        Parameters:
        dataSource - The HttpDataSource from which the manifest should be read.
        manifestUri - The URI of the manifest to be read.
        Returns:
        An instance of DashManifest.
        Throws:
        IOException - Thrown when there is an error while loading.

      • loadDrmInitData

        public static DrmInitData loadDrmInitData(DataSource dataSource,
                                          DashManifest dashManifest)
                                   throws IOException,
                                          InterruptedException
        Loads DrmInitData for a given manifest.
        Parameters:
        dataSource - The HttpDataSource from which data should be loaded.
        dashManifest - The DashManifest of the DASH content.
        Returns:
        The loaded DrmInitData.
        Throws:
        IOException
        InterruptedException

      • loadDrmInitData

        public static DrmInitData loadDrmInitData(DataSource dataSource,
                                          Period period)
                                   throws IOException,
                                          InterruptedException
        Loads initialization data for the representation and returns the sample Format. Loads DrmInitData for a given period in a DASH manifest.
        Parameters:
        dataSource - The HttpDataSource from which data should be loaded.
        period - The Period.
        Returns:
        The loaded DrmInitData, or null if none is defined.
        Throws:
        IOException - Thrown when there is an error while loading.
        InterruptedException - Thrown if the thread was interrupted.

      • loadSampleFormat

        public static Format loadSampleFormat(DataSource dataSource,
                                      Representation representation)
                               throws IOException,
                                      InterruptedException
        Loads initialization data for the representation and returns the sample Format.
        Parameters:
        dataSource - The source from which the data should be loaded.
        representation - The representation which initialization chunk belongs to.
        Returns:
        the sample Format of the given representation.
        Throws:
        IOException - Thrown when there is an error while loading.
        InterruptedException - Thrown if the thread was interrupted.

      • loadChunkIndex

        public static ChunkIndex loadChunkIndex(DataSource dataSource,
                                        Representation representation)
                                 throws IOException,
                                        InterruptedException
        Loads initialization and index data for the representation and returns the ChunkIndex.
        Parameters:
        dataSource - The source from which the data should be loaded.
        representation - The representation which initialization chunk belongs to.
        Returns:
        ChunkIndex of the given representation.
        Throws:
        IOException - Thrown when there is an error while loading.
        InterruptedException - Thrown if the thread was interrupted.
